dmca.title: NOTIFICATION OF OUR COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL ON YOUR SERVERS
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Payne Peter [mailto:peter@pcrdist.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2006 10:02 AM
To: legal@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: legal@pcrdist.com; RUSSIAN BEAUTIES
Subject: NOTIFICATION OF OUR COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL ON YOUR SERVERS



Dear ISP,


We are officially notifying you that your customer, cinemajuggs.com, is
engaged in pirating the videos and images of Yulia Nova, who is a famous
Russian model from Moscow. Ms. Yulia Nova's videos and photos are the
property of Satoshi Kizu, a Japanese photographer, and our company, who has
paid a fee to license the images for use outside of Japan. The webmaster's
continued distribution of Yulia's pictures despite having been warned on
repeated occasions leaves us no choice but to contact you. We ask that you
please remove the offending site immediately (or disable DNS) and provide us
with their contact information.

We verify under pain of perjury that are the the licensed copyright holders
for Yulia Nova's works, and this individual does not have the right to
distribute her movies. Ownership can be verified by viewing
http://www.russian-b.com and http://www.yulianovaworld.com. Since the
webmaster has been warned repeatedly, his piracy of Ms. Nova's works becomes
a "willful" and malicious attempt to damage our business, with additional
legal penalties provided for by law of up to $150,000 per offense, see
http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca512/notice.cgi?NoticeID=630#FAQID4176 for
more information).

Our contact info: PCR Distributing Co PO Box 421106 San Diego CA 92124
peter@pcrdist.com (858) 715-1134 (you can also talk with Laura Pientka who
is the manager in San Diego). Please do not hesitate to contact me if you
need further information. We look forward to your reply.

The infringing work can be seen at

http://tracker.cinemajuggs.com/details.php?id=4e28c0fa249544fd3e2e6c2b68fd41
0e380b7c51

(Yulia Nova?s Summer in Moscow DVD)




I verify that we are the legal and valid copyright holders of Yulia Nova?s
works outside of Japan, and that all statements in this document are
accurate and true to the best of my knowledge.
